thread.title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Maritime Hotel, Bantry
thread.title_full: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: The Maritime Hotel, Bantry - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Maritime Hotel, Bantry
text:
AUTUMN GETAWAY : €119pps midweek or €129pps weekend - 2 nights Bed & Breakfast and Dinner on one evening. Located overlooking Bantry Bay. Includes use of the leisure centre with 19m pool and entertainment in The Maritime Bar on select dates. This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid September 1 to November 15, 2015.
www.themaritime.ie
